home.title: Afrahna Platform
home.subTitle: We have all the services you need for your wedding day

hals.pageTitle: Best Wedding and Event Halls - Afrahna
hals.metaDescription: Book the finest luxury wedding halls in various sizes and elegant designs. We provide halls with complete facilities and excellent services for all occasions.
hals.introText: Choose from the most beautiful wedding halls suitable for your needs. Spacious areas, luxurious decorations, and full equipment to ensure your event’s success.

halsDecoration.pageTitle: Top Wedding Hall Decoration Services - Afrahna
halsDecoration.metaDescription: Wedding hall decoration services with the latest designs and creative ideas. Full or partial decoration as you wish at the best prices.
halsDecoration.introText: Turn your wedding hall into a masterpiece with our comprehensive decoration services. Innovative designs, coordinated colors, and luxurious arrangements suitable for all tastes.

carsDecoration.metaDescription: Wedding car decoration services with the finest designs and natural flowers. Luxurious decoration for your wedding convoy worthy of your special occasion.
carsDecoration.introText: Make your wedding convoy unforgettable with our luxurious car decoration services. Innovative designs and coordinated colors to suit all tastes.

coffeeKiosks.pageTitle: Best Coffee Kiosks for Events - Afrahna
coffeeKiosks.metaDescription: Professional mobile coffee kiosk rentals for events and weddings. Serving hot and cold drinks with high quality.
coffeeKiosks.introText: Add a special touch to your event with our mobile coffee kiosks. Elegant designs and professional service to provide the best drinks to your guests.

chairs.pageTitle: Chair Rental Services for Weddings and Events - Afrahna
chairs.metaDescription: Elegant chair and table rentals for weddings and events. Various options of luxurious and comfortable chairs at competitive prices.
chairs.introText: We provide a wide range of chairs and tables suitable for all types of events. Luxurious, comfortable, and high-quality chairs matching your taste.

cosmatics.pageTitle: Best Beauty Salons for Brides and Events - Afrahna
cosmatics.metaDescription: We offer the best beauty salons specializing in makeup and hair styling for brides and guests. High quality and professional service worthy of your special day.
cosmatics.introText: We offer the best beauty salons specializing in makeup and hair styling for brides and guests. High quality and professional service worthy of your special day.

pastry.pageTitle: Best Wedding and Event Pastries - Afrahna
pastry.metaDescription: A distinctive selection of wedding pastries with high quality and innovative designs. Eastern and Western pastries to suit all tastes.
pastry.introText: Choose from our wide range of expert-made pastries. We offer traditional and modern pastries in various shapes and sizes.

frezzer.pageTitle: Freezer Rental Services for Events - Afrahna
frezzer.metaDescription: Beverage freezer rentals for events and weddings. High-quality freezers in different capacities with delivery and installation services.
frezzer.introText: We provide high-quality beverage freezers for large and small events. Daily or weekly rental with delivery and installation services.

photography.pageTitle: Wedding and Event Photography Services - Afrahna
photography.metaDescription: Professional wedding photographers to capture the best moments of your event. High-quality photography and video services.
photography.introText: Preserve your event memories beautifully with our experienced photographers. We offer comprehensive photography services tailored to all needs and budgets.

stereo.pageTitle: Professional Audio System Rentals for Events - Afrahna
stereo.metaDescription: Rental of professional audio and stereo systems for events and weddings. Complete stereo systems with microphones and expert technician service.
stereo.introText: Make your event livelier with our professional audio systems. We provide full audio setups with high quality for excellent sound experience.

coocks.pageTitle: Top Cooks for Events and Weddings - Afrahna
coocks.metaDescription: Professional cooks services to prepare special dishes at your event. Cooks specialized in Arabic and international cuisines.
coocks.introText: Enjoy special dishes prepared by professional cooks at your event. We offer a wide range of cooks specializing in various types of cuisine.

restaurants.pageTitle: Best Restaurants for Wedding Receptions - Afrahna
restaurants.metaDescription: List of the best restaurants suitable for wedding receptions. Luxurious dining halls and diverse menus that suit all tastes.
restaurants.introText: Choose from the best restaurants suitable for wedding receptions. Diverse menus and excellent service worthy of your special occasion.

witress.pageTitle: Professional Waiter Services for Events - Afrahna
witress.metaDescription: Providing professional waiters to serve guests at events and weddings. A trained and complete team to ensure excellent service.
witress.introText: We provide a professional team of waiters to serve your guests with the highest professionalism. High training and wide experience in event service.

fireWorks.metaDescription: Organizing fireworks shows for events and weddings. Customized and safe shows supervised by licensed and professional teams.
fireWorks.introText: Add a magical touch to your event with our special fireworks shows. We offer safe and innovative shows supervised by professional and licensed teams.

invitationCards.metaDescription: Custom invitation card designs for weddings and events. Innovative designs and luxurious materials matching your taste.
invitationCards.introText: Design unique invitation cards worthy of your event. We offer a wide variety of designs and luxurious materials reflecting your personality.

nuts.pageTitle: Best Nut Selections for Events - Afrahna
nuts.metaDescription: Providing luxurious and fresh nuts for events and weddings. Premium quality nuts with elegant packaging.
nuts.introText: Choose from our wide selection of luxurious nuts for events. High quality and elegant packaging suitable for your guests.

religiousband.pageTitle: Religious Singing Bands for Events - Afrahna
religiousband.metaDescription: Providing professional religious singing bands for events and weddings. Beautiful voices and songs suitable for religious occasions.
religiousband.introText: Add a special spiritual atmosphere to your event with our professional religious singing bands. We offer a selection of distinguished bands with beautiful voices.

kidsEntertainment.pageTitle: Kids Entertainment Services for Events - Afrahna
kidsEntertainment.metaDescription: Comprehensive entertainment programs for kids at events and weddings. Fun and safe activities supervised by specialists in child care.
kidsEntertainment.introText: Provide your young guests with fun and safe time with our special entertainment programs. Interactive activities and fun competitions supervised by specialists.

fruitDecoration.pageTitle: Fruit Decoration and Arrangement Services for Events - Afrahna
fruitDecoration.metaDescription: Luxurious fruit decoration and arrangement for events and weddings. Innovative designs with fresh and high-quality fruits.
fruitDecoration.introText: Add a touch of elegance and distinct taste with our luxurious fruit arrangements. We offer innovative designs made from fresh and high-quality fruits.

weddinggifts.metaDescription: Special gift arrangements for newlyweds on their wedding. Creative ideas and professional execution for gifts worthy of your happy occasion.
weddinggifts.introText: Give special gifts to newlyweds expressing your feelings on their wedding day. We offer creative ideas and professional execution for customized gifts.

luxuryCars.pageTitle: Luxury Car Rentals for Weddings - Afrahna
luxuryCars.metaDescription: Rental of modern luxury cars for wedding convoys. A unique selection of the latest luxury models with professional drivers.
luxuryCars.introText: Make your wedding convoy more special with our luxury cars. We offer a unique selection of the latest models with professional drivers.

dapkaPlatform.pageTitle: Best Dabka Platforms for Events and Weddings - Afrahna
dapkaPlatform.metaDescription: We provide the best platforms for traditional Dabka dance, in various sizes and designs suitable for weddings and special events. High-quality materials and safe installation.
dapkaPlatform.introText: Add excitement and joy to your party with our sturdy and custom-made Dabka dance platforms. We provide platforms in various sizes and designs suitable for all types of events.

privacy.title: Afra7na Platform Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Afra7na, we consider your privacy very important. This policy defines how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information. By using our platform, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

sections.title: Information We Collect
items: Account information (name, email, phone number, optional profile picture)
Usage data (types of services used, browsing duration, preferences)
Payment information (via secure gateways like PayFort or Apple Pay; we do not store card data)
Technical data (IP address, browser type, language settings)

sections.title: How We Use Data
items: Improve and personalize user experience
Provide better technical support and troubleshoot issues
Send important updates or special offers (with your consent)
Analyze platform performance and make improvements
Comply with legal obligations

sections.title: Information Protection
items: Encrypt data during transmission using TLS/SSL protocols
Secure storage according to PCI DSS standards for payment data
Restricted access for authorized personnel only
Regular security audits of the system

sections.title: Your Rights
items: Request a copy of your personal data
Request correction of inaccurate information
Request deletion of your personal data (subject to legal restrictions)
Unsubscribe from promotional messages
Withdraw consent for data processing

sections.title: Data Sharing with Third Parties
items: Only approved payment service providers
Service partners necessary for platform operation
Government entities when legally required
We do not sell your data to external marketing parties

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For any inquiries about our privacy policy or data practices, please contact us via:

privacy.lastUpdate: This policy was last updated on 27.5.2025. We reserve the right to amend this policy and will post any changes on this page with an updated review date.

terms.title: Afrahna Platform Terms of Use
terms.intro: These terms govern your use of the Afrahna platform and define users' rights and obligations. Please read them carefully before using the platform.

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
items: By using Afrahna, you agree to be bound by these terms.
If you do not agree to any part, you must stop using the platform.

sections.title: Platform Usage
items: Use the platform only for legal and legitimate personal or professional purposes.
Do not post or share offensive, misleading, illegal, or rights-violating content.
Fraudulent or harmful activities are prohibited.

sections.title: Account Creation
items: Provide accurate and complete information when creating an account.
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials.
Report any unauthorized use of your account immediately.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
items: All intellectual property rights belong to Afrahna or its licensors.
Do not copy, republish, or reuse any part of the platform without written permission.

sections.title: Modifications to Terms
items: We may update these terms at any time at our discretion.
Updates will be posted on this page with the modification date.
Continued use of the platform after changes means acceptance of the updated terms.

terms.contactUsDescription: For inquiries or feedback regarding the Terms of Use, please contact us via:
terms.lastUpdate: The Terms of Use were last updated on {{date}}. We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time and will post updates on this page.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How can I book a service from the platform?
faq.a1: Browse the categories, choose the right service, then click 'Book Now' and follow the instructions to complete the booking
faq.q2: Do I need to create an account to book?
faq.a2: Yes, you must be registered so we can link bookings to you and offer proper support
faq.q3: Can I cancel a booking after payment?
faq.a3: Yes, but depending on the provider’s policy. Some services allow full or partial refunds within a specific period
faq.a4: We accept credit cards, Apple Pay, STC Pay, and bank transfer for certain plans
faq.q5: How can I contact the service provider?
faq.a5: After booking, a 'Contact Provider' button will appear on your booking page. You can also contact us directly

plans.choosePlan: Choose the plan that suits you
